title: Customer Churn Prediction Model
overview: Developed a machine learning model to predict customer churn with 92% accuracy, enabling proactive retention strategies and reducing churn by 18%.
goals: Identify key factors driving churn with explainable AI
Provide actionable, real-time insights to the marketing team
challenges: Handling imbalanced dataset and feature engineering for diverse customer behaviors. Ensuring model explainability for stakeholder buy-in.
solutions: Utilized SMOTE for oversampling the minority class and employed domain expertise for creating impactful features. Integrated SHAP for model interpretability. Implemented a robust cross-validation strategy.
